about.title: OUR SPA
about.description: Auren Spa is a sanctuary for wellness and relaxation where your body and mind find balance.
about.mainText: Enjoy our personalized treatments, from therapeutic massages to facial and body care, in a calm and welcoming environment. Our goal is to provide you with a deep relaxation experience that renews your energy and vitality.
about.secondaryText: Come and discover your Auren moment! ðŸŒ¿

services.title: SPA SERVICES
services.description: Here you will find our spa services described

therapeutic.title: Body Treatments
therapeutic.description: Our therapeutic massages help to relax muscles, relieve stress, and improve circulation.

subServices.title: Relaxing Massage
subServices.description: Gentle, relaxing techniques that reduce stress and tension while improving blood circulation. Includes aromatherapy and tea.

subServices.title: Swedish Massage
subServices.description: Deep muscle relaxation through decontracting techniques. Includes aromatherapy and tea.

subServices.title: Sports Massage
subServices.description: A deep, intense massage that relieves muscle fatigue caused by physical exertion, helps improve injuries, and promotes relaxation. Includes aromatherapy and tea.

subServices.title: Hot Stone Massage
subServices.description: The heat of the stones deeply relaxes the most fatigued areas of the body and contributes to energetic balance thanks to the properties of obsidian. Includes aromatherapy and tea.

signature.title: Signature Collection
signature.description: Exclusive experience of premium treatments inspired by ancient rituals and modern techniques.

subServices.title: Hydrating Facial
subServices.description: Facial treatment that purifies and revitalizes the skin through deep cleansing, intense hydration, and antioxidant protection. Includes aromatherapy, clay mask application, concentrated serums, and a relaxing neck massage for fresh, balanced skin.

wellness.description: Immerse yourself in a sensory experience that combines aromatherapy, music, and relaxation techniques.

subServices.title: Hot Stone Therapy

locations.text: A ritual where peace, calm, and technique come together to offer you a moment of connection, harmony, and renewal.

medical.title: The Art of the Skin
medical.text: Facial and body treatments that care for, nourish, and enhance your skin, leaving it visibly radiant and balanced.
